protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide-binding proteins (G proteins) are involved as modulators or transducers in various transmembrane signaling systems. G(k) is the stimulatory G protein of receptor- regulated K(+) channels

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
